body: Many half-orcs revel in acts of wanton destruction. Half-orcs with this racial trait gain a +2 racial bonus on Strength checks to break objects and on sunder combat maneuver checks. This racial trait replaces orc ferocity.
name: Gatecrasher
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Orcs/Alternate Racial Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/Gatecrasher
